full_summary:
**Janitorial Services: Fredericton Research and Development Centre**
================================DONE================ hereby invite tenders for the provision of Janitorial Services at the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) Fredericton Research and Development Centre located in Fredericton, New Brunswick. 

**Bidding Details**
-----------------

*   **Invitation Number:** 01B46-22-054
*   **Closing Date and Time:** September 9, 2022, at 14:00 EDT
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Contracting Entity:** Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The successful contractor will be required to provide all necessary personnel, equipment, and materials to provide facility cleaning services at the Fredericton Research and Development Centre.

**Site Visit**
-------------

It is mandatory that bidders attend a site visit at the Fredericton Research and Development Centre, to be held on August 24, 2022. Bidders who do not attend the site visit will not be given an alternative appointment and their bid will be declared nonresponsive.

**Required Documents**
--------------------

All tender documents including the Request for Proposal (RFP) can be obtained through the Buy and Sell service provider’s platform. 

**Contact Information**
-------------------

Questions and clarifications related to this tender should be directed to:

Carol Rahal, Contracts Officer
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
2001 Robert-Bourassa, Room 671-TEN, Montréal, QC, H3A 3N2
Phone: 418-928-1059
Email: carol.rahal@agr.gc.ca
